There was once an appointment, that is to attend the wedding of my favorite person. But on the way to his wedding, Yu Mu unfortunately suffered an accidental death.
In order to get an opportunity to be born again in the real world, she must complete the task given by the system, and the failure will completely kill the soul. If you succeed, you have a chance to resurrect.
This is her last mission and was systematically rated as the most difficult world.

And you need to destroy their affection for the game world Mary Su Baiya, or take the initiative to Raider them, increase their affection for Mu Mu, and complete the Raiders, let them resume their dual business.
